meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! It's time to get this groovy review party started!

Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous has got everyone in the gaming world feeling like they're on a wild adventure, and I'm here to give you the scoop. I've read all the reviews, from GameSpace to Cubed3, and I'm ready to share my thoughts with you.

First off, let me just say that this game is huge! Like, seriously massive. You'll be exploring for hours on end, making choices that have real consequences, and battling it out with all sorts of creatures. It's like a tabletop campaign come to life!

Now, I know what you're thinking - "Is it too much?" And my answer is... kinda? The game does get overwhelming at times, and there are some frustrating bugs to deal with. But hey, that's just part of the charm, right?

One thing that really stands out to me is the sense of importance. You feel like you're actually making a difference in the world, which is super cool. And let's not forget those mythic paths - they add a whole new level of depth to the game.

Of course, no one's perfect (not even me!), and Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous isn't without its flaws. But hey, that just makes it more like us, right? Imperfect but lovable!

In conclusion, if you're an RPG fan looking for a new adventure, look no further! This game is the real deal. Just be prepared to invest some serious time and maybe roll with some of those pesky bugs.

That's it from me - Hippo Penny - your go-to groovy gaming reviewer!
